name: Double Keys!
description:
A new Amstrad CPC 464 game for game contest CPCRetroDev 2021.

 DESCRIPTION 

You must collect all the lost keys through three worlds full of dangers.

Can you help the boys get all the red and blue keys? You have a limited number of attempts. If you die ten times, the game is over. Can you get a high score and stamp your name on the Olympus of the gods or will you die trying?

Double keys! can be played with a single player or with two players.

The game is completely programmed in the Locomotive Basic 1.0 language.

 HOW TO PLAY  [ONE PLAYER GAME]

'<-': Go to the left

'->': Go to the right

'space bar': Switch active hero

[TWO PLAYERS GAME]

Red Boy (player one)

'<-': Go to the left

'->': Go to the right

Blue Boy (player two)

'o': Go to the left

'p': Go to the right

Also compatible with joystick.

AUTHORS AND LICENSES 

Game program, graphics and music developed by Antonio Corpas Cuenca.

Development utilities:

Notepad++ | Text Editor 

CPCTelera 1.5 | Amstrad CPC game engine

 GESTURE 

The game includes a special level where you must collect rainbows instead of red and blue keys as a tribute to the game Rainbow Islands.

 CASSETTE LOADING INSTRUCTIONS 

CPC 464: RUN" (ENTER)

CPC 664/6128: |TAPE (ENTER) RUN" (ENTER)
